item.title: A Container for My Databases
item.description: Who doesn’t like containers? Anyone doesn’t like to have most of the benefits of virtual machines with much, much less overhead? They’ve been around since forever (anyone still remember chroot?) but only in recent years their popularity boomed, mainly due to cloud computing, I’m sure. I’ve been running databases in docker for a while now. I was curious about other alternatives, so I did a bit of benchmarking.
